document.full_text: dialed in, the favorite for saturday's $2.2 million kentucky derby, offers hope that the most famous and revered u.s. horse race will produce another great champion to challenge for the triple crown.
document.title: dialed in the favorite in wide-open kentucky derby
lines_and_colors: dialed in, the favorite for saturday's $2.2 million kentucky derby, offers hope that the most famous and revered u.s. horse race will produce another great champion to challenge for the triple crown.
